column2: SELECT TOP #         s.specObjID, s.z, dbo.fCosmoAbsMag(g.modelMag_r-g.extinction_r,s.z) M_r, dbo.fCosmoDl(s.z) D_l , g.modelMag_r-g.extinction_r mr                FROM Galaxy as g         INNER JOIN SpecObjAll s ON s.bestObjID = g.objID            WHERE  s.z > # AND s.z<# AND (s.primTarget & #) != # and (s.primTarget & #) = #)            SELECT FLOOR(M_r*#)/#, COUNT(*)        FROM q        GROUP BY FLOOR(M_r*#)/#     ORDER BY #
